email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to offer a shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HAWK, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for November 10-15, 2023. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.50 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and provide the vessel's last three B/Ls?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 20,000 per day.

I have attached the last three B/Ls for the MV OCEAN HAWK. Please let me know if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

[ATTACHMENTS: BL_history_1.pdf, BL_history_2.pdf, BL_history_3.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer and the B/Ls. We are considering combining cargo from another port to optimize the vessel’s round trip. Could you provide a quote for a multi-port option?

Also, could you confirm the laycan and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

For a multi-port option, we would need to look at the specifics, but we can certainly discuss it. The laycan remains November 10-15, 2023, and there are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Let me know if you have more details on the additional port and cargo size.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We are looking at an additional 50,000MT from a port nearby Tubarão. Could you revise the freight quote considering this additional cargo?

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 17.75 per MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as November 10-15, 2023. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services
